discordRpc.appId: Discord application ID for Rich Presence
discordRpc.button: Button text in Rich Presence (e.g. URL or action)
discordRpc.details: Details text displayed in Rich Presence
discordRpc.displayPause: Show pause status when playback is paused
discordRpc.enableRpcButtonListen: Enable listening for Rich Presence button clicks
discordRpc.enableWebsiteButton: Show Website button in Rich Presence
discordRpc.showSmallIcon: Use small icon for Rich Presence
discordRpc.supporterHideBranding: Hide PulseSync branding in Rich Presence
discordRpc.showVersionOrDevice: Show app version or device info in status
discordRpc.statusDisplayType: Type of status to display in RPC
discordRpc.statusLanguage: Language to use for status display
discordRpc.lockedByDrpcV2: Temporary lock for built-in RPC while DRPCV2 mod is active

mod.name: Mod name
mod.updated: Whether the mod is updated to the latest version

settings.askSavePath: Ask for a save path when exporting
settings.autoStartApp: Automatically start the app on system login
settings.autoStartInTray: Start the app minimized to tray on system startup
settings.autoStartMusic: Automatically start music playback when the app starts
settings.closeAppInTray: Minimize to tray instead of quitting when closing
settings.deletePextAfterImport: Delete temporary Pext files after import
settings.description: Main application behavior flags and settings
settings.devSocket: Enable developer mode: open debug socket
settings.hardwareAcceleration: Enable or disable GPU hardware acceleration
settings.lastDisplayId: ID of the last display that hosted the app window
settings.musicReinstalled: Flag indicating whether music was reinstalled
settings.saveAsMp3: Save tracks/results as MP3 by default
settings.saveWindowDimensionsOnRestart: Save window size on close and restore on next launch
settings.saveWindowPositionOnRestart: Save window position on close and restore on next launch
settings.showModModalAfterInstall: Show mod info modal after installation
